tool_description: Trestle's Phone Validation API, formerly known as Phone Intelligence API, validates the phone number and provides phone metadata, such as carrier name, line type (landline, mobile, non-fixed VoIP, etc.), is the phone prepaid, etc, and includes a phone activity score to help identify disconnected phones. Typical use cases for this API include lead validation, lead contactability, and lead prioritization.
title: Phone Intelligence API

api_list.name: getPhoneIntel
api_list.description: Trestle Phone Validation API validates the phone number and provides phone metadata such as carrier name, line type (landline, mobile, non-fixed voip, etc.), is the phone prepaid, etc. Typical use cases where the API is used include lead quality assessment and thus lead prioritization, as well as to weed out potential fraud, including bots using non-fixed voip or burner phones.

required_parameters.name: phone
required_parameters.description: The phone number in E.164 or local format. The default country calling code is +1 (USA).

optional_parameters.name: country_hint
optional_parameters.description:
The ISO-3166 alpha-2 country code of the phone number. See: [ISO-3166](https://www.nationsonline.org/oneworld/country_code_list.htm)
test

id.description: The persistent ID of the phone number.

phone_number.description: The phone number in E.164 or local format. The default country calling code is +1 (USA).

is_valid.description: True if the phone number is valid.

country_calling_code.description: The country code of the phone number.

country_code.description: The ISO-3166 alpha-2 country code of the phone number. See: [ISO-3166](https://www.nationsonline.org/oneworld/country_code_list.htm)

country_name.description: The country name of the location associated with the phone number.

line_type.description:
The line type of the phone number.

* `Landline` - Traditional wired phone line.
* `Mobile` - Wireless phone line.
* `FixedVOIP` - VOIP number connected to a physical address, such as Vonix or Comcast.
* `NonFixedVOIP` - VOIP number unconnected to a fixed physical address, such as Google Voice or Skype.
* `Premium` - Caller pays a premium for the callâ€“e.g. 976 area code.
* `TollFree` - Callee pays for call.
* `Voicemail` - Voicemail-only service.
* `Other` - Line type is unclear or does not match current categories.

carrier.description: The company that provides voice and/or data services for the phone number. Carriers are returned at the MVNO level.

is_prepaid.description: True if the phone is associated with a prepaid account.

name.description: Incomplete response due to external timeouts.
